author: Kimberly (Stylish Sidekick)
title: Amazon: Heavy Duty 14″ Chefs Pizza Chopper Only $4.99 (Regularly $29.99)
text:
Head on over to Amazon where you can score this Heavy Duty 14″ Chefs Pizza Chopper for only $4.99 (regularly $29.99). Not only can use use this to slice up your pizzas, but it also chops up herbs, minces onions, dices vegetables, slices fruit and just about anything else!

Get free shipping on a $49 order, a $25 Book order OR snag free 2-day shipping on ANY size order with Amazon Prime (you can sign up for a FREE 30-day trial here ). OR, choose free no-rush shipping and get a $5.99 credit for Prime Pantry OR a $1 credit for eBooks & more – may vary by user.
(Thanks, Savings Done Simply !)
